name: MovieConsultant
0:
”Alexa open Movie Consultant”
”Recommend me movies like Interstellar”
”Recommend me thriller movies”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie consultant
des:
Discover new movies suitable for you by asking for specific and personalized advice:

- Similarity to one of your favorite movies ("Recommend me movies like The Matrix")
- Movie genres and release date periods ("Recommend me action movies" or "Recommend me science fiction movies from 2010 until 2015")
- Presence in the cast of particular actors or actresses ("Recommend me movies with Robert De Niro")
- Directors you don't miss a movie of ("Recommend me movies directed by Woody Allen")

Comfortably add recommended movies to the Movie Consultant list (available on Amazon Alexa application), so that you don't miss a tip.

Movie data is courtesy of "The Movie Database (TMDb)".
